Hello! Welcome to my blog. I am The Meridian Sun. Here on this blog you will be able to find my photography work as well as everything I like accross the internet world.

a wonderful complexity

  • May 21, 2020
  • Photography
  • 4 Comments

A Wonderful Complexity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents.

tripping out - led by a dressed monkey

  • May 19, 2020
  • Videography
  • 1 Comment

Filmed on Mars 5, 2020, a mostly first-person chronicle of the day's events leading up to a performance in Wollongong, Australia. Shot on Canon 5D mkII with 50mm 1.2 and 24-70 lenses.

flyingpool - goldmine

  • May 18, 2020
  • Music
  • No Comments

FlyingPool est un projet dreampop aux accents parfois shoegaze parfois folk et issu de la collaboration entreElena Lacroix (chant, guitare, clavier) et Antoine Colen (batterie, guitare), deux multi-instrumentalistes qui partagent une même passion : créer des mélodies sensibles et envoutantes. Le groupe est accompagné sur scène d'une série de synthétiseurs pour former des nappes atmosphériques et des basses rondes.

a day in the life

  • May 17, 2020
  • Photography
  • No Comments

He must tried it a hundred times, shut his eyes so that he wouldn't have to look at the floundering legs, and only stopped when he began to feel a mild, dull pain there that he had never felt before.

"Oh, God", he thought, "what a strenuous career it is that I've chosen! Travelling day in and day out."
